title: Last one left! --- Affordable Studio Apt --- Back Bay -- All Utils Inc
neighborhood: Back Bay / Bay State Rd / 5 Min walk to Newbury St
posting_body: ['Studio apartment', 'Only $1450 with Heat, hot water, electricity and cooking gas included (AC is not included in monthly rent and is additional fee in summer only per month if desired) Internet not included', 'Underpriced! similar apartments are usually $1600 - $2000+', 'Third floor apartment - not in basement', 'Available September 1st', "Broker fee for this apartment is one month's rent", 'Amazing location - super easy commute to Longwood Medical, MIT, Fenway, etc', 'Kitchenette', 'High Ceilings', 'Located in a classy, ornate brownstone style brick building on Beautiful & Prestigious Bay State Road', 'Laundry in building, Bike Storage in building, Elevator in building', 'Parking available behind the building for additional monthly fee if desired.', 'Inquire for more details', '12 month lease required', 'No pets allowed.', 'No students allowed.', 'Single occupancy only.', 'If interested, email patrick @ <URL> (no spaces) or text your email address to 508.243.5319', 'When reaching out please give a brief description, what you do for work, etc.', 'Will not last!', 'Patrick Gray', 'Metro Realty Corp', '508-243-5319']
